text: Munhu yoyose yandikiligwe kugeligwa mkifungo, kogeligwa mkifungo. Na munhu yoyose yandikiligwe kukomigwa na zele, kokomigwa na zele.13:10 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha YELEMIA 15:2; 43:11. Mbuli ino nhegulo yake iyo ino, wanhu wa Mulungu wolondigwa wawe na mwazaganyo na wawe bule uzenzeleganye.
